about:
As a recent graduate with a Bachelor's degree in Information Systems and a specialized certification in MERN Stack Development from Yenetta Code, I am passionate about leveraging technology to drive business solutions. I possess a solid foundation in database management, systems analysis, and cybersecurity, integrated with hands-on experience in full-stack web development using MongoDB, Express.js, React, and Node.js.

My education has equipped me with critical problem-solving skills and a holistic understanding of IT project management, enabling me to deliver robust and scalable software solutions. I thrive in dynamic and collaborative environments and am eager to contribute to innovative projects that make a real impact.

Technical Skills:
Frontend: React, HTML, CSS, JavaScript
Backend: Node.js, Express.js
Database: MongoDB
Other: Git, RESTful APIs, Agile Methodologies

I am actively seeking opportunities to apply my skills in real-world scenarios and continue my professional growth. Please feel free to connect!
